channel.title: Srl include problem
channel.description:
hello everyone :) just a problem that im always getting. i try and run powerWCers and Powerminers using srl includes but i always get messages on SCAR 2.03 like this,
line 157: [error] (9173:4) : unknown identifier 'newchatmsg' in script c:\program files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\skill\woodcutting.scar
i also have had a message saying about 'processpicture' please help me in anyway you can
thankyou very much:)

item.title: Srl include problem
item.dc:creator: @hello_to_you_all hello to you all
item.description:
@hello_to_you_all wrote:

done all that and i have sorted the problem thankyou all for your help :)

Read full topic

item.title: Srl include problem
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

Go into the SRL folder and make sure you have moved everything in the “Move to plugins” folder into the SCAR plugins folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Srl include problem
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Probably a procedure that wasn’t implemented into SRL at the time the script was made, but then was later implemented, just delete the procedure/function probably.

Read full topic

item.title: Srl include problem
item.dc:creator: @yna_ajhear5 yna_ajhear5
item.description:
@yna_ajhear5 wrote:

No need to make multiple threads.

Read full topic
